hero.title: Yoga, Somatic Coaching & Sound Healing
hero.body:
Most people try to think their way out of stress. I work differently.

I start with the body, and the mind follows.

google.ariaLabel: {{rating}} out of 5 on Google, based on {{count}} reviews

intro.title: Welcome
intro.p1: For overthinkers, sensitive people, or anyone who feels constantly stressed and mentally overloaded. When mental stress becomes normal, the body pays the price.
intro.p2: You can't fully relax. You can't stop overthinking. Brain fog. Poor sleep. Constant tension.
intro.p3: Through somatic yoga, coaching, and sound healing, we work on the multiple levels where stress patterns are stored , not just talking.
intro.p4: So your focus improves. Your sleep gets better. And you get your energy back. By changing the pattern at its root.

courses.title: Services
courses.subtitle: A short overview of what's available. Tap “Learn more” for details.

sound-healing.title: Sound Healing 1:1
sound-healing.description: A private sound session to calm your nervous system: This helps your busy mind to switch off and you body to fully relaxe.
sound-healing.details:
A 1:1 sound healing experience using singing bowls placed around and on the body. The vibrations support deep relaxation and energetic balance.

We begin with a short check-in, and a gentle arrival in the body. You'll be guided through grounding and regulation practices before we move into an immersive sound journey.

Afterwards, we take time for integration, so you leave feeling tension-free, calm and mentally quiet.

sound-bath.title: Group Sound Bath
sound-bath.description: A group sound experience designed to regulate your nervous system and quiet mental noise. Lie down. Receive. Reset.
sound-bath.details:
A shared sound experience for small groups using singing bowls and rhythmic vibration to bring the body into a state of deep rest.

You'll be invited to get comfortable with cushions and blankets while sound creates a safe container for slowing down. This is ideal if you want to decompress, reset, and feel more grounded. No prior experience needed, just come as you are and allow yourself to receive.

somatic-coaching.title: Somatic Coaching 1:1
somatic-coaching.description: For people who feel constantly stressed, overwhelmed, or stuck. We work with your body, not only your thoughts, to create real, lasting change.
somatic-coaching.details:
A body-based work focused on embodied awareness. Instead of analyzing only your story and your thoughts, we integrate also what is happening in your body right now.

What you gain:

- Practical tools to regulate stress

- Less reactivity, more clarity

- A stronger sense of inner stability

- Sustainable coping skills between sessions

yoga-and-meditation.title: Yoga & Meditation
yoga-and-meditation.description: Slow, body-aware movement for people who feel stressed, mentally overloaded and didn´t learn how to relaxe.
yoga-and-meditation.details:
These sessions are focused on body awareness, breath, and nervous system balance.

Ideal for:

- Beginners

- Overthinkers

- People who feel disconnected from their body

priceLines: Drop-in classes: €30 per person / €100 per month

trainings-and-workshops.title: Trainings & Workshops
trainings-and-workshops.description: Workshops for personal growth, regulation, and embodied learning.
trainings-and-workshops.details:
Interactive trainings and workshops for groups - designed to translate somatic understanding into everyday life.

Formats can include education, guided practices, reflection, and simple tools you can apply immediately. Suitable for teams, communities, and private groups.

Dates and topics change - subscribe to receive new workshop announcements and upcoming offerings.

ifs.title: Internal Family Systems (IFS)
ifs.description: A structured approach to understand and work with the different parts inside you. Build clarity. Build inner leadership.
ifs.details:
A compassionate framework to explore inner conflicts, protective patterns, and emotional triggers without judgment.

What you gain:

- Self-understanding

- Reduced inner conflict

- Stronger emotional regulation

- Clearer decision-making

- Self-compassion

about.title: My Journey
about.summary:
My healing didn't happen all at once.

It unfolded step by step, across time, places, and seasons of my life.
about.body:
I left Tunisia at 17 and moved to Italy to study medicine. I worked and studied at the same time. For years, I lived in survival mode. I burned out more than once. I kept going anyway. Italy was a chapter of endurance, there I learned how to survive. When I finally moved to Germany, the survival stopped and  I discovered I was carrying Complex PTSD with dissociative disorder. And that's when everything I had been holding in for years began to surface. And what came up at first was emotional meltdown and later emotional breakdown ,patterns I didn't understand yet.

Years later i moved to Dubai. There I was diagnosed with generalized anxiety disorder and my therapist identified me as a highly sensitive person. I started therapy, and it helped but the real turning point though came one year later in the Netherlands. That´s where, I stepped into personal development trainings and discovered embodiment practices.I still remember the first tears of joy, the first time i didn´t feel dissociated from my body.

I felt alive, i felt fully present, i felt at home within. That was the moment I realized: My body had been speaking all along. I just hadn't learned how to listen yet. Learning to listen changed everything.

What started as a journey to heal myself slowly became something more. I trained in somatic coaching in UK. I studied Internal Family Systems in Jordan. I continued with yoga, sound healing, and Reiki in Nepal. In Nepal, during a three-day silent fasting retreat in a mountain temple, something became clear in that stillness.

During the meditation, The name came to me -Heart to Heart Somatics. I knew then that i wanted to hold space for others to come home to themselves. Today, my work is from my heart to yours. It comes from lived experience. Because I know what it means to survive. I know how to feels to come home. And I know what it takes to finally feel safe in your own body.
about.imageAlt: Portrait-style image representing personal growth and calm

t1.quote: Mariem's sound healing felt like dreaming and flying - I arrived tired and left deeply rested, almost like after a nourishing holiday. Her gentle voice and warm space touched my heart
t1.name: Jolin

t2.quote: Mariem's coaching helped me uncover limiting beliefs and provided practical tools that now guide my daily life. Her patience and intuitive guidance pushed me beyond my comfort zone into real growth.Thank you Mariem. You are awesome!
t2.name: F. Joseph

t3.quote: Working with Mariem has been deeply transformative - she holds space with rare warmth, compassion, and intuitive wisdom. Her blend of IFS and somatic work helped me reconnect with myself in profound ways. If you're looking for someone who genuinely cares and has the wisdom and skills to support your healing, i can't recommend Mariem highly enough!
t3.name: Omnia

t4.quote: I felt deeply supported by the diverse, rich group Mariem brought together, and by the care put into every detail of the retreat. Her planning, hospitality, and presence made me feel safe and seen.
t4.name: Pid'or

t5.quote: Mariem's sound bath during the lunar eclipse was a powerful ritual that left my body and soul vibrating in harmony. I felt realignment, clarity, and deep feminine connection return to me.
t5.name: Monika

t6.quote: Yoga with Mariem is simply beautiful. You immediately feel at ease with her; everything is relaxed and natural. She has a very pleasant manner and creates an atmosphere where it's easy to switch off. The classes are clear, flowing, and yet profound. You immediately sense that Mariem has a wealth of experience and that yoga is truly a part of her life. The fact that she learned and practiced yoga in Nepal gives her classes a special depth.I always leave the class with a wonderful feeling. Highly recommended.
t6.name: Rebecca Cappucci

t7.quote: Being held in Mariem's space is a true wonder , each session helps me connect more deeply with my inner and outer worlds. I always leave feeling inspired, renewed, and full of insight.
t7.name: Rena

pricing.title: Packages
pricing.subtitle: Everything is tailored to your needs. We build your package together - based on your goals, schedule, and a pace that feels right for you. Always respecting where you are in life.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: A few quick answers to help you feel oriented before you book.

q1.a: We start with a short check-in and an intention for the session. Then we move into a guided practice (e.g., somatic grounding, breath, gentle movement, sound). We close with integration—so you leave with clarity, a calmer baseline, and simple next steps you can take into daily life.

q2.q: Do I need experience with yoga, meditation, or somatics?
q2.a: No. Everything is beginner-friendly and adaptable. The focus is on body awareness and safety—not performance. You can always choose smaller, slower steps.

q3.q: Online or in-person—which should I choose?
q3.a: Both can be deeply effective. In-person offers a dedicated studio space and direct support. Online is flexible and works well if you prefer your own environment. You'll receive clear guidance either way, and we choose the format that best matches your goals and comfort.

q4.a: Packages are custom—built around your needs, your schedule, and what feels supportive. After a free welcome session, we recommend a rhythm (e.g., weekly, biweekly) and combine modalities that fit you. You can adjust anytime as your needs change.

q5.a: Heart 2 Heart Somatics offers somatic support, coaching, and education—not medical or psychotherapeutic treatment. If you're in acute crisis or need clinical care, we'll recommend the right professional support. If you're unsure, the free welcome session is a good first step.

q6.a: Please reschedule as early as possible if something changes. For late cancellations, the session may be charged depending on the notice period. You'll receive the exact policy when booking so everything is transparent.

q7.a: Yes—parking is available at the Rossini parking lot (subject to availability).

privacy.title: Privacy policy
privacy.body:
1. Controller
Mariem Werhani (Heart 2 Heart Somatics)
Mercedesstr. 3, 30453 Hannover, Germany
Email: info@heart2heartsomatics.com (subject: “Privacy”)
Phone: 01515-5351628

2. Summary
This is a static single-page website. We do not use analytics or advertising trackers.

3. Hosting (GitHub Pages)
The site is delivered via GitHub Pages. When you access the site, technical connection data (e.g., IP address, device/browser data, time of access) is processed for delivery and security.

4. Local storage (settings)
Depending on your choices, the site stores language/theme/accessibility settings in your browser to provide the requested functionality.

5. External links
If you open external links (e.g., Calendly or Google), the privacy policy of that provider applies.

Last updated: 2026-02-15

accessibility.title: Accessibility statement
accessibility.body:
This accessibility statement applies to the “Heart 2 Heart Somatics” website (single-page app incl. dialogs).

We aim to make the site as accessible as possible. No formal audit has been conducted yet.

Limitations
Third-party content (e.g., Calendly/Google) is outside our control.

Last updated: 2026-02-15

cookies.title: Cookies & local storage
cookies.description: We use strictly necessary storage to remember your accessibility, theme and language preferences. Optional categories are off by default and require your consent.

settings.description: Adjust optional categories. Necessary storage is always enabled.

necessary.label: Necessary
